pkgmetadata.longdescription: Formatting and Harmonizing Ecological Trait-Data // Assistance for handling ecological trait data and applying the Ecological Trait-Data Standard terminology (Schneider et al. 2018 doi:10.1101/328302). There are two major use cases: (1) preparation of own trait datasets for upload into public data bases, and (2) harmonizing trait datasets from different sources by re-formatting them into a unified format. See 'traitdataform' website for full documentation.
